website_summaries.verdict: Cool looking modern end table with a design in the support legs that almost gives you an optical illusion.
pros: End table features a square glass table top and a square brushed nickel metal base
Support legs are set at a diagonal, creating a really cool look
Glass top is thicker than you'd expect
cons: Will be a little small for some users, as it measures just 22 inches on all sides

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my space. Shipping was super fast. They were easy to assemble. My daughter and I put both of these together in less than an hour. Love the contemporary look.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Patton

customer_reviews.title: Mad. AF
customer_reviews.text: When will I learn that I need to order things like furniture straight from the manufacturer got this table today and there are two holes that you're supposed to be able to put screws through to anchor the metal bars on the side of table and you can't because the screw holes are too small so I'm guessing that's why this said used somebody else must have had the same issue wish the seller that I bought the previous table just like this one from had an extra one left over I do not recommend you purchase this table from this seller
customer_reviews.author: gerren washibgton

customer_reviews.title: and very sturdy construction. Super easy to put together -- took ...
customer_reviews.text: very high quality side table! I also purchased the matching coffee table! thick glass tops, and very sturdy construction. Super easy to put together -- took about 20 minutes total for each, and I didn't need any assistance. These pieces look MUCH higher quality than you'd ever expect given the price. They look like they would be 5 X the price! The steel legs are very high quality metal , not that shiny cheap chrome look that similar pieces of furniture in this price range have! I'm Very pleased with this purchase and highly recommend!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: H. S.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Trash
customer_reviews.text: Received this today (a day late), smelling terrible. Attempted to build, before realizing half of this was completely corroded. Rusted over and couldn't get a single Bolt in. Attempting to see if I can get a replacement, but now half to wait a week when I'd expected it yesterday. I can't keep this piece of trash in my small apt for another 24 hours so if amazon or Ashley doesn't come to receive this piece of trash, that's where it's going. Not expensive, but seemed okay enough for the price. Ashley/Amazon... make this right. I know there can be quality control issues, but this was an utter and smelly failure.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: IMPOSSIBLE TO ASSEMBLE! Incorrect Instructions and Pieces
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE! The pieces are incorrectly labelled in the instructions and the Screw holes INCORRECTLY DRILLED! - Tried several hours, several ways and does not go together! TERRIBLE! Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: I'm absolutely in LOVE with this coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely in LOVE with this coffee table! Contemporary design, glamorous and clean lines. This table has the look of an expensive private label brand. I'm also glad it was so easy to assemble. It comes with easy instructions and a screw key, screws, rubber bumpers for the bottom of the table and for the top to hold the glass top. The package came relatively quickly and I did have contact with the seller. The package weighed 60 pounds. And there was no damage in delivery!
customer_reviews.author: NZINGHA

customer_reviews.title: Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: These tables are HOT! I love them, they look so cool.
customer_reviews.author: Clg23

customer_reviews.title: Table legs can’t sustain any weight! Will bend!
customer_reviews.text: First off, the instructions were wrong. After figuring out that debacle, the table was finally set up. Less than one week later, disaster. I weigh about 120 pounds and was sitting next to the table. I put my arm on it and put some weight down as I got up. Within seconds, the entire leg of the table bent. Despite my best efforts to “straighten it out”, the table won’t go back to normal. The legs are made of cheap metal that bends at the slightest weight. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Loomis J

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking table, however, the holes for the leg screws are not sturdy and basically strips when installing the bolts. I had to be extremely careful to strategically assemble this in a way to not damage it. I got it together and reasonable secure, and I can move it, but I’m terrified about the idea picking it up! All they had to do is make more secure screw holes and I would’ve rated this 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shane S.

customer_reviews.title: Great table. Instructions were confusing.
customer_reviews.text: This only took about an hour to put together, however, the instructions were incorrect (or I thought so) misleading me to assemble upside down. Took a few tries to figure it out PLUS having to stretch as adjuste the legs to link the finishing holes up. All together not bad. Just takes a little extra thinking to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: April Compher

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very poorly manufactured. The top holes where the glass sits are all in different places. It looks super tacky unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell C.

customer_reviews.title: Classy, modern, sturdy. A+
customer_reviews.text: This table was an awesome value for under 140. This table looks very modern and classy. I would definitely recommend and buy again. Sturdy. Putting it together was not too difficult. An extra pair of hands will make the job go quicker. About 20 mins and it was completed. I checked the stores and no one had this for less than 200. Some places charged over 400 for the exact same piece.
customer_reviews.author: Buysalot

customer_reviews.title: Good price, sleek and modern and free shipping and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: We lost our house from the fire last December, after staying at the hotel for 3 months finally we got a small apartment, I’m so impressed with this modern design, we loved it, Quick delivery, easy to assemble and cheaper compare to the furniture store , I almost give 5 stars but after assembling, we noticed the sharp edges, but it’s ok, it’s very minimal issue. Perfect size for our new place.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table...  Came with scratches
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful table but mine arrived with several scratches to the frame which was disappointing. It is pretty large (3 ft x 3 ft) so be aware if you live in a small space I live in a studio but I was adamant about getting the table I wanted and it works perfectly with my decor. I just really really wish the scratches were removed or fixed by Ashley.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't assemble
customer_reviews.text: First table ordered didn't have all the screws. Second table ordered could not be assembled because the screws provided didn't seem to be the right size. What a mess. What a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: One bad apple...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the other reviews are insinuating but this table is beyond gorgeous and was easy to assemble. Received it within a week and everything is solid.
customer_reviews.author: R. Crew

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with quality nice looking table
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this twice. The screws would not catch. The second I was able to assemble but it still wasn't sturdy. I had an event at my home and sadly the table was bent by the end of the event. Not sure what happened but it should not have been that easy to bend.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Worst experience since I can remember.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made, cheap look and feel, extremely bad quality, dents all over, could only put one out of four legs together. Bought this influenced by other reviews and couldn’t be more disappointed. Requesting my refund right away.
customer_reviews.author: Kleber Maia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I used the table to expand the living room set. It fit perfectly. Exactly what I expected. The glass is heavy, make sure you have someone to help you put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time buying this one
customer_reviews.text: This table may look pretty, but it was such a headache to put it together. Absolute night mare and at the end, when we finally managed to put together, it doesn’t really look as good as we thought. The suction cups look awful from the top view and the the box came in smelly.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Upset! Broke on the first day
customer_reviews.text: We assembled the coffee table the first day that we received it. Its a beautiful coffee table but its made extremely CHEAP! Assembling it was not easy and the screws didn't seem to fit well. I had guests over that same day that i assemble it and when my niece applied her book on the corner, the table sunk down. We are so dissatisfied with the purchase. We will never again buy from this company.
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK
customer_reviews.text: Table came with NO instructions manual and had to figure out by looking actual photo on amazon/youtube. Also some parts can’t be screwed bec holes are way too small for screws to pass through .
customer_reviews.author: Cid

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Easy to assemble. Seen in a furniture store for $350! Decided to look up on amazon glad I did. Half the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: Hate this. The holes don’t line up. Messed my entire housewarming event up with no table
customer_reviews.author: Shirelle Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful modern design.
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to assemble. Did it by myself. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine E. Downing

customer_reviews.title: Large surface area and modern look
customer_reviews.text: Elegant design and simple install. I bought two. Very supportive customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Y.R.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It gives my living room a more modern look. I assembled it on my own and it was easy, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: shannon c

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERY DIFFICULT TO ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: This thing took me a few days to assemble & had to buy diffrent screws that were just a tad bit longer because whoever built these did not attempt to see if everything fits correctly, very difficult but after its done table looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hermida

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with these side tables. The perfect addition to my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Just as I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy and level. I was nervous after reading reviews before purchasing. I had bought the matching coffee table on Craigslist and liked the modern look. The table arrived a day earlier than promised and was packaged well. The tables look great.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my end table. Putting it together was a small challenge but have fun in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Fior Duprey

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design and Construction
customer_reviews.text: The cross rails connecting to the top and bottom pieces are very poorly designed. They edges do not line up flush and bulge out quite a bit. Also, 2 of the 8 screws would not tighten down and continue to slip out when the end table is moved. By far the most poorly designed Ashley product I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Unique design
customer_reviews.text: This table was easy to put together and is a unique design that fit perfectly into our living room. Not to mention, it was pretty affordable. It did however arrive with a minor chip in the corner of the glass which I was sort of upset about but I got over it once I saw how awesome it looked in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: SRAC2011

customer_reviews.title: Poor manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: Stripped holes im arms poor manufacturing in one two side tables. Still awaiting an response on a solution.
customer_reviews.author: DANON H.

customer_reviews.title: I loved the design of the table itself but it isnt ...
customer_reviews.text: The table came with a disfunction while building it. One of the holes that connects the legs wouldn't screw well and it makes the whole table tumble if moved too much. I loved the design of the table itself but it isnt safe if it comes broken from factory.
customer_reviews.author: Mariela Laluz

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Requires 2 people to assemble. Some screws don't fit and never tighten. Seems flimsy. Got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good frame
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy frame. If you are looking for a 22 inch high coffee table and you can't find perfect measurement... You can order different size glass (like I did) and you will end up with custom made perfect size coffee table :)
customer_reviews.author: E. Z.

customer_reviews.title: The look
customer_reviews.text: Very contemporary, I receive compliments for this table all the time, I have the end tables matching, price is amazing
customer_reviews.author: sylvie

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were not very clear. Parts not clearly labeled. But the table is sturdy and beautiful a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Casie Kimbrough

customer_reviews.title: Might be nice; can't tell since did not come with hardware ...
customer_reviews.text: Might be nice; can't tell since did not come with hardware and waiting well over a month (despite several calls) to receive some to be able to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: A random mouse

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Attractive table, easy to install, looks great. I bought the cocktail table and two side tables. The cocktail's tempered glass was totally shattered during shipment but I called and it was quickly replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: End table
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't resist at this price. Not assembled yet but expect it too be perfect look for small space apartment
customer_reviews.author: tootsieroll57

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional product, especially considering how affordable it was. Sturdy and the tempered glass top is quality. The only downside was the assembly, there are minimal directions and things don't line up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces/Unsturdy
customer_reviews.text: My table came with missing pieces and it’s unsturdy. It’s beautiful but it wobbles and cant hold much weight (a vase with flowers in it) I ordered it before I moved into my new place and missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee table, looks amazing. It isn’t easy to assemble but it is worth it
customer_reviews.author: samantha colmenero

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The table looks really nice and the glass is thicker than I thought. I have received several compliments. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because I ordered 2 and they didn't arrive together. 1 of them took an additional week to arrive after i received the first one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Well got to the last part & screws fell inside the top frame gotta be extra careful on that part... but once I got them out it came out as expected I love everything about it would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: k.b

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Arrive with little scratches on the metal , easy to assemble,over all I like it
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: DONT
customer_reviews.text: Well I guess I just wasted 100 bucks on this damn table that is janky as all get out. The pieces don't fit right and I'm not able to return this. DO NOT BUY THIS JUST DONT
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Love these end tables
customer_reviews.text: I love my Ashley Coylin end tables. They're beautifully manufactured and fit perfectly into the space I planned for. They were easy to assemble and look rich. I've gotten many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Boisclair

customer_reviews.title: very bad product quality!
customer_reviews.text: The material is in very bad condition, and the assembly does not fit in its positions correctly, the steel looks stained
customer_reviews.author: Luciana Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful... looks just like the picture. Easy to set up. Very sturdy, qauality material

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The table looks good in the picture but really bad in reality. There are rust marks and blackened marks all over the table legs.
customer_reviews.author: Arjun Krishna

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful table once I got it put together
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful table once I got it put together. Very tedious, somewhat difficult to put together. It looks just like the $800.00+ original design and who's going to know. Clever these Chinese.
customer_reviews.author: Irwin P. Landsbaum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love it! Assembling was fairly easy, as my husband wasn’t home n I was able to do it myself. Sturdy n great quality!
customer_reviews.author: M.A. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality.. Very easy to put all pieces together .
customer_reviews.author: M. colburn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this set. I am wanted this set for the longest. And couldn't find it. The shipping was quick. It’s a great quality product for the price Thank you so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Realtalkbeauty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's the perfect size in height in length. You can add a lamp, some picture frames and accent decor. The glass is nice and round on the corners.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money. to hard to assemble missing screws with package

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it! It looks exactly like the picture

customer_reviews.title: Stylishly modern and unique
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together. I love the design - it's different. Sturdy. The glass did not completely align with table, which is why I only gave it 4 stars

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly on my own, looks just as in photos, actually bigger then what I thought.

customer_reviews.title: It looks exactly the same and couldn't be happier with it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after seeing it a few local stores for 3x the price. It looks exactly the same and couldn't be happier with it. Simple to put together.

customer_reviews.title: modern and beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love my table.... It fits perfectly with my sectional. It was easy to assemble and just may need an extra person to help lift the glass just to be on the safe side. This was a great purchase for me.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table sadley had to return as it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking table sadley had to return as it was too large I did not measure before I ordered that is only reason I gave 4 stars

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: this table is gorgeous, real brushed nickle finish. almost looks like stainless steel. fast shipping as well.

customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Building it had some problems with the screws

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We had it for about a month. It came without instructions. Loved the look, but didn’t last. Don’t recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking table and look fancy in my living room. Very modern and good quality for the price paid. Assemble is easy but carefull when you are screwing the legs, if you drop the screw inside the leg, it will take you a while to get it back. if happens use a magnet or a wire to recover it. I bought the side table as well and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eliane Adams

customer_reviews.title: Im so in love with my new coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Came before delivery date and glass came in one piece very great product so far love love love it well built

customer_reviews.title: Updated review.  Love the table
customer_reviews.text: The table is beautiful but mine came uneven so I haven't been able to put it together. I emailed the seller to let them know and I got a response back that I was over the 30 days and if I need any parts to contact Ashley. I responded back that it's not welded together right and am unable to assemble it. I never got a response. Update: I took some time and patience and I finally got the table to line up. Unfortunately I dropped a screw inside the table because you have to be very careful when inserting the screw and lining up the holes. I will have to order a new one to complete the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: its beautiful just what is pictured

product_meta.title: Signature Design by Ashley - Coylin Glass Top Square End Table, Brushed Nickel Finish
product_meta.description: Style Name:End TableYour quest for the ultimate end table has come to an end—that is if you lean toward contemporary. Decked out in a chic finish, the angled metal base is striking from every angle. The coylin square end table is topped off with a clear glass top with polished edging for a completely modern look.
feature_bullets: SQUARE END TABLE: Clean-lined and beautiful from all angles, this end table is a modern decor lover's dream. It adds chic shine to any living room or entryway
BEAUTIFULLY CRAFTED: Table is made of brushed nickel-tone metal and glass
UNIQUE FRAME: The angular metal base strikes a stylish pose from any angle, making this accent table a modern marvel to gaze at
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL FURNITURE: Measuring 22” W x 22” D x 22” H, set it next to a sofa to keep remotes and other daily essentials
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-read instructions, tools and hardware included
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars240 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
